data.actual_result: The typing bar is marginally in front of the buttons/timers, partially obscuring them (I assume this happens for all buttons and timers, however I have only tested with the above)
data.expected_result: The typing bar should be behind these buttons/timers
data.short_description: Buttons and timers on server join/account verification are slightly covered when someone in the current channel is typing
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an instance of discord on a brand new, unverified account (this can be done by opening a chrome incognito window and opening discord) - Make the account join a testing server with medium verification - Observe the Claim Account button, and then simulate typing in the channel with an alternate account or someone else - While they are typing, observe the button until they stop typing - Claim the account (or just rejoin on an alt account with the server set to tableflip verification) - Observe the timer, and then simulate typing as instructed before - While they are typing, observe the timer until they stop typing
